attentionWO:
"Needs attention" gives an indication to the manager that there might be something wrong with a WO.
A WO can be marked as needing attention if the Operational Need cannot be covered, in case it was "Rejected" or "Aborted" by the Assignees.

looseNote:
By default, Schedules are Strict, meaning each Checkpoint has its own specific Check Time Range.
If you select the 'Loose' option, you can set the same Check Time Range for all Checkpoints in the Schedule.
